channel.title: New players log into random place?! help!?!?!?!?
channel.description:
new players log into like 3225 by 3225 and i want them to login to my new home that i just made
but i cant find the code anywhere... can anyone help?

item.title: New players log into random place?! help!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @elijah101 elijah101
item.description:
@elijah101 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:3, topic:298017”][quote author=Mitko link=topic=394427.msg2931660#msg2931660 date=1251320067]
Look in player.java
[/quote]

In player.java, search initial

or if its 508, ::coords

Under it should say “Initial X and Y coordinates of the player”

Change the Numbers it shows to wherever you want it to start out.
Try ::mypos/::mypos2/look in Equipment Tab to find your coordinates.[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: New players log into random place?! help!?!?!?!?

item.title: New players log into random place?! help!?!?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Mitko:

Look in player.java

In player.java, search initial

Under it should say “Initial X and Y coordinates of the player”

Change the Numbers it shows to wherever you want it to start out.
Try ::mypos/::mypos2/look in Equipment Tab to find your coordinates.
